001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.avaje;
002
003import java.util.List;
004
005import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
006
007import io.avaje.config.Config;
008import io.avaje.config.Configuration;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.ServiceRegistry;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
013import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
014
015/**
016 * Makes avaje provide properties to RainbowGum.
017 */
018@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
019public class AvajePropertiesProvider
020                implements RainbowGumServiceProvider.PropertiesProvider, RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator {
021
022        /**
023         * For service loader.
024         */
025        public AvajePropertiesProvider() {
026        }
027
028        @Override
029        public List<LogProperties> provideProperties(ServiceRegistry registry) {
030                var props = new AvajeProperties(Config.asConfiguration());
031                registry.put(AvajeProperties.class, props);
032                return List.of(props);
033        }
034
035        @Override
036        public boolean configure(LogConfig config) {
037                var registry = config.serviceRegistry();
038                var props = registry.findOrNull(AvajeProperties.class);
039                if (props != null) {
040                        props.configuration.onChange(e -> {
041                                config.changePublisher().publish();
042                        });
043                }
044                return true;
045        }
046
047}
048
049class AvajeProperties implements LogProperties {
050
051        final Configuration configuration;
052
053        public AvajeProperties(Configuration configuration) {
054                super();
055                this.configuration = configuration;
056        }
057
058        @Override
059        public @Nullable String valueOrNull(String key) {
060                return configuration.getNullable(key);
061        }
062
063}
